Banner.Description: I’m a passionate leader transitioning from investigating fraud at Apple into software now after putting myself through college. 4 years of coding in research labs and internships have taught me how to quickly throw together MVP’s to elicit feedback and also how to carefully craft reliable software with multiple teams to impact millions of customers.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 4 years developing software, I’ve made life easier for teammates at Apple and Dell, while spending my free time coding tools to amplify the efforts of the Center for Child Protection, local artists, and underpriveledged students. I’m currently leading two open source projects building an AI-native teaching assistant being used at Texas State University, and a mobile app being used by Meals On Wheels.

My leadership skills have been honed by incredible mentors while leading hundreds of projects at Apple, leading two student clubs with IEEE and Google, and founding/dissolving two startups. My software skills can be attributed to years in academic research, 3 internships, and building dozens of personal projects. I'm very comfortable in novel problem spaces.
My goal is to cultivate my engineering and leadership skills so I can help more people.
Experience.Title: Work Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineering Researcher in 4 research labs
Description: 1. Improved interview prep for engineers using genAI and research-backed pedagogical techniques
2. Increased food security by contributing to a HIPAA compliant mobile app for Meals On Wheels
3. Investigated new data augmentation techniques for ML using Stochastic Gradient Ascent and tuning CNN’s
4. Stabilized living conditions for dozens of fish and plants using solar power and a cloud of Raspberry Pi’s

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineering Intern for 3 Summers
Description: 1. Accelerated a legal process in a $2.4 Billion enterprise sales pipeline using AI / NLP, Python, and Kubernetes
2. Saved global teams 12 hours/week/person by combining 7 different database lookups into one app
3. Increased datalake integrity of 300 million customer records by writing tests for a streaming data pipeline

Experience.Jobs.Title: Online Instructor
Description: Taught kids Python, Machine Learning, and Web Dev

Experience.Jobs.Title: Teaching Assistant for Software Engineering
Description: Taught 80 students full-stack software engineering under an Engineer-in-Residence from Meta
We built apps using Flask, React, and PostgreSQL deployed to Fly.io

Experience.Jobs.Title: Senior Fraud Specialist
Description: Taught myself Python and Javascript to automate my role and take on more responsibilities
Saved $1 billion/year by leading fraud investigations and training teams in North America
Solved leadership’s biggest pain point by creating a database of tribal knowledge from 20 top performers
Organized 250 community service events for Apple in my spare project time

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Agrourbana
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Monitoring application made from scratch with auth module, configurable graphics, configurable alarms, and user management. It also has feedback form logic for parameter configuration.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Tu super plan
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Health plan quote that has a search engine with which advanced queries are made. Plans are displayed based on the user's age, monthly income, and location. It has online chatcontact form, notification system by whatsapp and mail, auth, and internet information management through the role of administrator.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Proyexiot
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Data monitoring platform belonging to water wells, tugboats, and various installations made from scratch with auth module, configurable graphics, configurable alarms, user management, and geolocation with openlayers.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Hands game
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The rock-paper-scissors game extended. A personal project developed in angular in which you play randomly against the machine. It has the use of services, interfaces, and components.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Countries viewer
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: An interface that consumes an API of countries with which you can view a list of countries, see details of each country, filter by name and region. It also has a dark mode to switch between dark and light themes.

OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Investigating the effects of using a Convolutional Neural Network to augment image datasets. Increasing the amount of labeled training data without needing more images.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Dell Intern Hackathon (First Place)
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Automated a business process on a team of 5 interns. I handled parsing, transforming, and loading survey data into a stable-marriage matching algorithm.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Automated Aquaponic Farm Experiment
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Automated an intelligent, solar-powered, aquaponic farm using 7 Raspberry Pi's attempting to impact world hunger. This code kept 20+ Tilapia alive by keeping chemical levels at equillibrium.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I'm happy to connect and learn about your work or collaborate on a project.
